name: Set Session
func:
global.set("session_" + msg.payload.convoUser, msg.payload);

return msg;

name: Define Session
Wire up a Session storage subflow
info:
For prototyping use SetNodeRedSession

For Enterprise use either Redis or Cloudant

Note you will need a Redis/Cloudant service if
pick one of the Enterprise methods.

name: Get Session
func:
msg.session = global.get("session_" + msg.user); 

return msg;

GetMssqlSession
query:
SELECT TOP 1
convoUser,
wcs_user_name,
wcs_password,
workspace_id,
convoTS,
convoSource,
convoIntent,
convoDialogNode,
convoDialogType,
convoDialogIntents,
convoDialogEntities,
convoDialogConfidence,
convoCounter,
convoTransID,
convoUtterance,
REPLACE(convoAnswer,''','''') as convoAnswer,
REPLACE(REPLACE(convoPayload,'"','"'),''','') as convoPayload

FROM session_ver3  where convoUser = '{{{payload}}}'  ORDER BY convoTS DESC

name: Need the nodred-contrib-mssql node installed via the palette
Msg Response

msg.payload = msg.search_results;



return msg;

payload: what is going on with banks

name: Set msg.user
func:
msg.user = msg.payload
return msg;

name: Get Session
Fix Date/ConvoPayload
func:
var d = msg.payload.convoTS

newdstr = d.getMonth()+1 + "/" + d.getDate() + "/" + d.getFullYear() + " " + d.getHours() + ":" + d.getMinutes() + ":" + d.getSeconds() + ":" + d.getMilliseconds()
msg.payload.convoTS = newdstr

msg.payload.convoPayload = JSON.stringify(msg.payload.convoPayload)
return msg;

name: New UCG MSSQL with params sent via msg
US Log error
func:
node.error("US WCS failed will try Germany for user " + msg.user + ' Error: '+ msg.error.message);
return msg;

name: Germany Log Error
Log Error
func:
node.error("NodeRed - Caught Error from " + msg.error.source.name + ' Error Msg: '+ msg.error.message);
return msg;
